name: Eshopper
headline: Score Rankings
overview: The ESHOPPER app monitors your user's purchase journey experience, generating valuable improvement recommendations to boost your results
features: Reports of the main KPIs of your store
additionalinformation: ESHOPPER will generate periodic recommendations for your team to prioritize the improvements that most impact your results, putting your ecommerce ahead of the market
